title: Apple iPad Air 2 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi Only

product_specification.Processor Type: A8X Chip with M8 Motion Co-processor
product_specification.Additional Features: Apple Pay, iBeacon Microlocation, Siri, Hands-free, Dual Microphones, Lightning Connector, AirDrop, iCloud Drive, QuickType Keyboard, AirPlay, iTunes Radio, Control Center, Multi-tasking, Spotlight Search, Family Sharing, Notification Center, Calender, iT
product_specification.Sales Package: USB Cable, USB Power Adapter, Tablet
product_specification.USP: 1.2 MP Secondary Camera, 9.7 inch Touchscreen, iOS 8, 8 MP Primary Camera
product_specification.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Three-axis Gyro Sensor, Barometer, Accelerometer, Touch ID Sensor, Digital Compass
product_specification.Other Business Features: DOC, DOCX, Keynote, PDF, PPT, PPTX, TXT, XLS, XLSX
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Tap to Focus, Five-element lens, Auto Image Stabilization, Autofocus, Exposure Control, Burst Mode, Backside Illumination, Panorama (up to 43MP), Timer Mode, 8MP iSight Camera, Auto HDR for Photos, Photo Geotagging, f/2.4 Aperture, Face Detection, Hybrid IR Flter
product_specification.Other Display Features: Retina Display, LED Backlit Widescreen, IPS Technology, Finger Print-resistant Oleophobic Coating, Anti-reflective Coating, Fully Laminated Display
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: MJPEG, MOV, H.264, MP4, MPEG4, M4V, AAC-LC
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: MP3, AAC-HE, WAV, AAX, VBR, AIFF, AAC, AAX+

product_description.Thinner And More Beautiful Display: This ultra-thin iPad Air 2 is redesigned, by fusing three layers into one, to give you the best experience. Watch videos and photographs with more vivid colors and greater contrast. The antireflective coating further makes this tablet one of the least reflective displays.
product_description.Massive Power On A Minimal Form: Work, play, have fun and do all that you want with this Apple iPad Air 2. With the A8X chip and 64-bit desktop-class architecture, this Apple tablet delivers better CPU and graphics processor and is as powerful as many personal computers. With up to 10 hours of battery life, this tablet keeps you entertained as long as you want.
product_description.Security Right At Your Fingertip: Unlock this tablet with just one touch. This Apple iPad Air 2, with its breakthrough Touch ID technology, gives you an unparalleled level of security so you cannot just unlock the tablet but you can also make secure purchases in iTunes, iBooks, and the App Store.
product_description.Two Amazing Cameras: Take incredible selfies, FaceTime with your loved ones and capture beautiful moments with this iPad Air 2's amazing camera with stunning features like panorama, time-lapse videos, slo-mo, and burst and timer modes.
product_description.Faster Connectivity: Download movies, stream videos and browse the internet as fast as you can with this Apple iPad Air 2. Thanks to its superfast Wi-Fi + Cellular model, this tablet is equipped with faster, more advanced LTE technology so you can make fast connections when you are one the go.
product_description.Apps Designed For IPad: There's an app for everything you do and every interest you have, like browsing the web, checking emails, editing movies, writing reports, photography, gaming, travelling, and reading books, on the App Store. The apps are also designed for the large Retina display and provide a great user-experience.
product_description.iOS 10: This Apple iPad Air 2 runs on the iOS 10 and lets you multitask seamlessly. Check messages while drafting an email, check your mail while creating presentations, do much more with this Apple tablet.

review:
I am very happy with seller and flipkart. Genuine product, packaged well and delivered on time. What else could make customer happy.

And is anyone really looking for Ipad feedback ! Name speaks for itself.

This is my first Apple device. I am sharing my experience after using the device for 3 days.

Build Quality is superb.
Display is very awesome.
Touch ID is great and works well all the time.
Very slim (6.1mm).

I played the games Iron Man 3, Candy Crush Saga, Stick Tennis, Real Racing 3, Sonic Dash, 300 Game, Pirates, Bike Rivals. All the games worked really well. I haven't seen any lag.

***Updated the device with 8.1.1 and the iOS is running smooth.

Its almost 6month em using my ipad air 2 without any problem
Its the best tablet I would recommend
Almost you can do all the stuff which a notebook can do
Pros
Lightweight
Good sound output
Can use Microsoft office software for free from apple store
Retina display awesome clarity
Can be used as reading ebook
As it is apple product no issues in camera
Battery is awesome no issue
Cons
No option for expanding memory

What a product , light , fast , a vibrant retina display and a superb battery . a must buy . it comes with ios 10 pre installed . bought this on big billion day sales . Completely satisfied with my purchase . I hope this helps .

With the A8X chip iPad Air 2 is the fastest of all IOS devices . And thinner than a pencil.... its INCREDIBLE ..! Don't think twice ..just go for it.......but make sure that in 16gb you'll only get 11gb of free space and the rest goes with ICLOUD ?

This is a brief review assuming you're already familiar with ipads. I've owned a first gen mini, second gen mini, and IPad air 1 but this is definitely the best yet. Its really thin and apps load fast. We also have 2gb of ram, so apps like safari don't have to reload tabs. You can actually switch between apps without having to Wait for them to reload. The 1gb in other Apple products may be enough, but they won't be for future iOS updates whereas this iPad will handle the updates better making this kind of future proof.

The Touch ID is another stand out addition. It's great and also makes using passwords so much quicker. It's actually quicker to use Touch ID to unlock your iPad than to not have a password and swipe to unlock. The cameras are "better" but I personally don't care for such things. The battery life is on par with other iPads. Expect 10 hours.

One annoying thing is that the speakers vibrate (Especially when it comes to bass) the whole iPad because it's so thin. If you use headphones, nevermind but otherwise be aware of that. Lastly, the anti-reflective screen doesn't help reflections as well as I thought it would. It also seems harder to clean. Overall a wonderful and actually "future proof" iPad.

Pros: lighter, faster, more ram, better cameras
Cons: the speakers are "all about that bass", antiglare screen is a smudge magnet

Shipment : Nice packing, flawless. Delivery was well ahead of time.

Product: undoubtedly, the best tablet in the market. Robust operating system, Robust set of applications, a lot of scope for creativity. I know apple products are expensive, but i would rather invest on a ipad than a iphone for a reason that it easily replaces your home computer and you can pretty much do all of your day to day tasks on your tablet without going to your laptop or desktop. I know one can achieve it on an iphone as well but you'll lose out on the screensize.

A not so useful product if you're used to the accomplished androids. Bought it with high expectations, however came to realize that with iOS you can't do much. Now doing duty as an alarm and youtube player. Hardware is excellent though be it screen or sound or overall build.

In a nutshell, a great piece of hardware let down by a useless OS.

Excellent product. My first apple gadget. Great for document viewing, movies, and everything. Battery life is good too. Charge once in two days with moderate use. Only issue is I find Android more user friendly coz I'm used to it. Rest everything, kudos.!

This is an good tablet..Flipkart....specifically WS retail...are reliable and bang for the buck...I have always got a great experience whenever I have ordered from WS retail...iPad air 2.... Is a good product...all tabs put together and the iPad on the other side still does not match up...Apple is way ahead in technology..love the Touch ID, screen resolution, clarity, ..only one complaint...the CAMERA - the pictures are grainy, and bad quality..thats sad considering its an Apple product. The 3 star is for iPad minus the camera..

I am very happy with seller and flipkart. Genuine product, packaged well and delivered on time. What else could make customer happy.

And is anyone really looking for Ipad feedback ! Name speaks for itself.

To start with I had no intentions of purchasing this product now but was on my bucket list for this year.
An amazing deal cashback deal on the iPad on App Sale days lured me to purchase it right away
Prompt next delivery by Flipkart.
The product is awesome with a cool design & lots to offer on the OS front making its cheap android competitors look avoidable.

MUST BUY!!!

I have to say, this is one of the best gadgets I have ever used, across all platforms and hardware plethora in the market. Such amazing power under such a sleek and premium exterior. This is my first Apple experience, and boy, makes me wanna switch all my devices to Apple products (although I still love my Nexus 5). Of course, FlipKart delivery at its best, received within 2 days of placing the order.

Down to the real stuff. I find it difficult to present any Cons for this product. It is truly a masterpiece. Storage (16, 64 or 128GB) depends on how deep your pocket is, and I would suggest that a pure WiFi device would be more than adequate in these times of smartphones advances.

The only drawback or negative I could find is that while any audio plays, the device vibrates with. This is expected, with metal exteriors, not to mention how thin the device is, but well, once you snap a case on it, you will hardly notice a difference. And besides, audio/video is so much better on ear/headphones with the iPad Air 2.

All in all, I would suggest that this is a no-brainer. Buy it!!! Storage depends on your pocket, and the finger ID is quite a handy and pleasant addition to the iPad Air 2.

bought this device and later replaced also.
Pros: very light weight and amazing touch response.
Cons:
1. Unfortunately the 16GB one has only 10.5 available free
2. icloud was not working and even apple care executives were not able to resolve. I was able to sync in a 64 gb device, but couldn't in 16 GB ones.
3. The worst thing is from iOS 7 onwards, apple has withdrawn showing the filenames in photos and videos. Consequently, after transferring files to my ipad (via itunes), all the files were displayed as icons(all same icons) and no files names. Its a known issue. There is a tweak, but if you do it all the time you will loose substantial amount of time in that.
4. While playing the video files, the rear cover feels shaky.
5. Apple has withdrawn vlc player from its India app store, hence vlc player can no more be installed also.
I own few apple devices, but this time apple disappointed. This is an absurd logic to withdraw displaying the names of the files and no mechanism to show it. It seems like they assumed there customers can't read and should be shown icons to identify. Thinnest but a crap from Apple this time.
